7// Context.h: Defines the gl::Context class, managing all GL state and performing
8// rendering operations. It is the GLES2 specific implementation of EGLContext.
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_CONTEXT_H_
11#define LIBANGLE_CONTEXT_H_
12
13#include <mutex>
14#include <set>
15#include <string>

100class ErrorSet : angle::NonCopyable
101{
102 public:
103 explicit ErrorSet(Context *context);
104 ~ErrorSet();
105
106 bool empty() const;
107 GLenum popError();
108
109 void handleError(GLenum errorCode,
110 const char *message,
111 const char *file,
112 const char *function,
113 unsigned int line);
114
115 void validationError(GLenum errorCode, const char *message);
116
117 private:
118 Context *mContext;
119 std::set<GLenum> mErrors;
120};
121
122enum class VertexAttribTypeCase
123{
124 Invalid = 0,
125 Valid = 1,
126 ValidSize4Only = 2,
127 ValidSize3or4 = 3,
128};
129
130// Helper class for managing cache variables and state changes.
131class StateCache final : angle::NonCopyable
132{
133 public:
134 StateCache();
135 ~StateCache();
136
137 void initialize(Context *context);
138
139 // Places that can trigger updateActiveAttribsMask:
140 // 1. onVertexArrayBindingChange.
141 // 2. onProgramExecutableChange.
142 // 3. onVertexArrayStateChange.
143 // 4. onGLES1ClientStateChange.
144 AttributesMask getActiveBufferedAttribsMask() const { return mCachedActiveBufferedAttribsMask; }
145 AttributesMask getActiveClientAttribsMask() const { return mCachedActiveClientAttribsMask; }
146 AttributesMask getActiveDefaultAttribsMask() const { return mCachedActiveDefaultAttribsMask; }
147 bool hasAnyEnabledClientAttrib() const { return mCachedHasAnyEnabledClientAttrib; }
148 bool hasAnyActiveClientAttrib() const { return mCachedActiveClientAttribsMask.any(); }
149
150 // Places that can trigger updateVertexElementLimits:
151 // 1. onVertexArrayBindingChange.
152 // 2. onProgramExecutableChange.
153 // 3. onVertexArrayFormatChange.
154 // 4. onVertexArrayBufferChange.
155 // 5. onVertexArrayStateChange.
156 GLint64 getNonInstancedVertexElementLimit() const
157 {
158 return mCachedNonInstancedVertexElementLimit;
159 }
160 GLint64 getInstancedVertexElementLimit() const { return mCachedInstancedVertexElementLimit; }
161
162 // Places that can trigger updateBasicDrawStatesError:
163 // 1. onVertexArrayBindingChange.
164 // 2. onProgramExecutableChange.
165 // 3. onVertexArrayBufferContentsChange.
166 // 4. onVertexArrayStateChange.
167 // 5. onVertexArrayBufferStateChange.
168 // 6. onDrawFramebufferChange.
169 // 7. onContextCapChange.
170 // 8. onStencilStateChange.
171 // 9. onDefaultVertexAttributeChange.
172 // 10. onActiveTextureChange.
173 // 11. onQueryChange.
174 // 12. onActiveTransformFeedbackChange.
175 // 13. onUniformBufferStateChange.
176 // 14. onColorMaskChange.
177 // 15. onBufferBindingChange.
178 // 16. onBlendFuncIndexedChange.
179 bool hasBasicDrawStatesError(Context *context) const
180 {
181 if (mCachedBasicDrawStatesError == 0)
182 {
183 return false;
184 }
185 if (mCachedBasicDrawStatesError != kInvalidPointer)
186 {
187 return true;
188 }
189 return getBasicDrawStatesErrorImpl(context) != 0;
190 }
191
192 intptr_t getBasicDrawStatesError(const Context *context) const
193 {
194 if (mCachedBasicDrawStatesError != kInvalidPointer)
195 {
196 return mCachedBasicDrawStatesError;
197 }
198
199 return getBasicDrawStatesErrorImpl(context);
200 }
201
202 // Places that can trigger updateBasicDrawElementsError:
203 // 1. onActiveTransformFeedbackChange.
204 // 2. onVertexArrayBufferStateChange.
205 // 3. onBufferBindingChange.
206 // 4. onVertexArrayStateChange.
207 // 5. onVertexArrayBindingStateChange.
208 intptr_t getBasicDrawElementsError(const Context *context) const
209 {
210 if (mCachedBasicDrawElementsError != kInvalidPointer)
211 {
212 return mCachedBasicDrawElementsError;
213 }
214
215 return getBasicDrawElementsErrorImpl(context);
216 }
217
218 // Places that can trigger updateValidDrawModes:
219 // 1. onProgramExecutableChange.
220 // 2. onActiveTransformFeedbackChange.
221 bool isValidDrawMode(PrimitiveMode primitiveMode) const
222 {
223 return mCachedValidDrawModes[primitiveMode];
224 }
225
226 // Cannot change except on Context/Extension init.
227 bool isValidBindTextureType(TextureType type) const
228 {
229 return mCachedValidBindTextureTypes[type];
230 }
231
232 // Cannot change except on Context/Extension init.
233 bool isValidDrawElementsType(DrawElementsType type) const
234 {
235 return mCachedValidDrawElementsTypes[type];
236 }
237
238 // Places that can trigger updateTransformFeedbackActiveUnpaused:
239 // 1. onActiveTransformFeedbackChange.
240 bool isTransformFeedbackActiveUnpaused() const
241 {
242 return mCachedTransformFeedbackActiveUnpaused;
243 }
244
245 // Cannot change except on Context/Extension init.
246 VertexAttribTypeCase getVertexAttribTypeValidation(VertexAttribType type) const
247 {
248 return mCachedVertexAttribTypesValidation[type];
249 }
250
251 VertexAttribTypeCase getIntegerVertexAttribTypeValidation(VertexAttribType type) const
252 {
253 return mCachedIntegerVertexAttribTypesValidation[type];
254 }
255
256 // Places that can trigger updateActiveShaderStorageBufferIndices:
257 // 1. onProgramExecutableChange.
258 StorageBuffersMask getActiveShaderStorageBufferIndices() const
259 {
260 return mCachedActiveShaderStorageBufferIndices;
261 }
262
263 // Places that can trigger updateActiveImageUnitIndices:
264 // 1. onProgramExecutableChange.
265 ImageUnitMask getActiveImageUnitIndices() const { return mCachedActiveImageUnitIndices; }
266
267 // Places that can trigger updateCanDraw:
268 // 1. onProgramExecutableChange.
269 bool getCanDraw() const { return mCachedCanDraw; }
270
271 // State change notifications.
272 void onVertexArrayBindingChange(Context *context);
273 void onProgramExecutableChange(Context *context);
274 void onVertexArrayFormatChange(Context *context);
275 void onVertexArrayBufferContentsChange(Context *context);
276 void onVertexArrayStateChange(Context *context);
277 void onVertexArrayBufferStateChange(Context *context);
278 void onGLES1ClientStateChange(Context *context);
279 void onDrawFramebufferChange(Context *context);
280 void onContextCapChange(Context *context);
281 void onStencilStateChange(Context *context);
282 void onDefaultVertexAttributeChange(Context *context);
283 void onActiveTextureChange(Context *context);
284 void onQueryChange(Context *context);
285 void onActiveTransformFeedbackChange(Context *context);
286 void onUniformBufferStateChange(Context *context);
287 void onColorMaskChange(Context *context);
288 void onBufferBindingChange(Context *context);
289 void onBlendFuncIndexedChange(Context *context);
290
291 private:
292 // Cache update functions.
293 void updateActiveAttribsMask(Context *context);
294 void updateVertexElementLimits(Context *context);
295 void updateVertexElementLimitsImpl(Context *context);
296 void updateValidDrawModes(Context *context);
297 void updateValidBindTextureTypes(Context *context);
298 void updateValidDrawElementsTypes(Context *context);
299 void updateBasicDrawStatesError();
300 void updateBasicDrawElementsError();
301 void updateTransformFeedbackActiveUnpaused(Context *context);
302 void updateVertexAttribTypesValidation(Context *context);
303 void updateActiveShaderStorageBufferIndices(Context *context);
304 void updateActiveImageUnitIndices(Context *context);
305 void updateCanDraw(Context *context);
306
307 void setValidDrawModes(bool pointsOK, bool linesOK, bool trisOK, bool lineAdjOK, bool triAdjOK);
308
309 intptr_t getBasicDrawStatesErrorImpl(const Context *context) const;
310 intptr_t getBasicDrawElementsErrorImpl(const Context *context) const;
311
312 static constexpr intptr_t kInvalidPointer = 1;
313
314 AttributesMask mCachedActiveBufferedAttribsMask;
315 AttributesMask mCachedActiveClientAttribsMask;
316 AttributesMask mCachedActiveDefaultAttribsMask;
317 bool mCachedHasAnyEnabledClientAttrib;
318 GLint64 mCachedNonInstancedVertexElementLimit;
319 GLint64 mCachedInstancedVertexElementLimit;
320 mutable intptr_t mCachedBasicDrawStatesError;
321 mutable intptr_t mCachedBasicDrawElementsError;
322 bool mCachedTransformFeedbackActiveUnpaused;
323 StorageBuffersMask mCachedActiveShaderStorageBufferIndices;
324 ImageUnitMask mCachedActiveImageUnitIndices;
325
326 // Reserve an extra slot at the end of these maps for invalid enum.
327 angle::PackedEnumMap<PrimitiveMode, bool, angle::EnumSize<PrimitiveMode>() + 1>
328 mCachedValidDrawModes;
329 angle::PackedEnumMap<TextureType, bool, angle::EnumSize<TextureType>() + 1>
330 mCachedValidBindTextureTypes;
331 angle::PackedEnumMap<DrawElementsType, bool, angle::EnumSize<DrawElementsType>() + 1>
332 mCachedValidDrawElementsTypes;
333 angle::PackedEnumMap<VertexAttribType,
334 VertexAttribTypeCase,
335 angle::EnumSize<VertexAttribType>() + 1>
336 mCachedVertexAttribTypesValidation;
337 angle::PackedEnumMap<VertexAttribType,
338 VertexAttribTypeCase,
339 angle::EnumSize<VertexAttribType>() + 1>
340 mCachedIntegerVertexAttribTypesValidation;
341
342 bool mCachedCanDraw;
343};
344
345using VertexArrayMap = ResourceMap<VertexArray, VertexArrayID>;
346using QueryMap = ResourceMap<Query, QueryID>;
347using TransformFeedbackMap = ResourceMap<TransformFeedback, TransformFeedbackID>;
348
349class Context final : public egl::LabeledObject, angle::NonCopyable, public angle::ObserverInterface
350{
351 public:
352 Context(egl::Display *display,
353 const egl::Config *config,
354 const Context *shareContext,
355 TextureManager *shareTextures,
356 SemaphoreManager *shareSemaphores,
357 MemoryProgramCache *memoryProgramCache,
358 const EGLenum clientType,
359 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs,
360 const egl::DisplayExtensions &displayExtensions,
361 const egl::ClientExtensions &clientExtensions);
362
363 // Use for debugging.
364 ContextID id() const { return mState.getContextID(); }
365
366 egl::Error onDestroy(const egl::Display *display);
367 ~Context() override;
368
369 void setLabel(EGLLabelKHR label) override;
370 EGLLabelKHR getLabel() const override;
371
372 egl::Error makeCurrent(egl::Display *display,
373 egl::Surface *drawSurface,
374 egl::Surface *readSurface);
375 egl::Error unMakeCurrent(const egl::Display *display);
376
377 // These create and destroy methods are merely pass-throughs to
378 // ResourceManager, which owns these object types
379 BufferID createBuffer();
380 TextureID createTexture();
381 RenderbufferID createRenderbuffer();
382 ProgramPipelineID createProgramPipeline();
383 MemoryObjectID createMemoryObject();
384 SemaphoreID createSemaphore();
385
386 void deleteBuffer(BufferID buffer);
387 void deleteTexture(TextureID texture);
388 void deleteRenderbuffer(RenderbufferID renderbuffer);
389 void deleteProgramPipeline(ProgramPipelineID pipeline);
390 void deleteMemoryObject(MemoryObjectID memoryObject);
391 void deleteSemaphore(SemaphoreID semaphore);
392
393 void bindReadFramebuffer(FramebufferID framebufferHandle);
394 void bindDrawFramebuffer(FramebufferID framebufferHandle);
395
396 Buffer *getBuffer(BufferID handle) const;
397 FenceNV *getFenceNV(FenceNVID handle) const;
398 Sync *getSync(GLsync handle) const;
399 ANGLE_INLINE Texture *getTexture(TextureID handle) const
400 {
401 return mState.mTextureManager->getTexture(handle);
402 }
403
404 Framebuffer *getFramebuffer(FramebufferID handle) const;
405 Renderbuffer *getRenderbuffer(RenderbufferID handle) const;
406 VertexArray *getVertexArray(VertexArrayID handle) const;
407 Sampler *getSampler(SamplerID handle) const;
408 Query *getOrCreateQuery(QueryID handle, QueryType type);
409 Query *getQuery(QueryID handle) const;
410 TransformFeedback *getTransformFeedback(TransformFeedbackID handle) const;
411 ProgramPipeline *getProgramPipeline(ProgramPipelineID handle) const;
412 MemoryObject *getMemoryObject(MemoryObjectID handle) const;
413 Semaphore *getSemaphore(SemaphoreID handle) const;
414
415 Texture *getTextureByType(TextureType type) const;
416 Texture *getTextureByTarget(TextureTarget target) const;
417 Texture *getSamplerTexture(unsigned int sampler, TextureType type) const;
418
419 Compiler *getCompiler() const;
420
421 bool isVertexArrayGenerated(VertexArrayID vertexArray) const;
422 bool isTransformFeedbackGenerated(TransformFeedbackID transformFeedback) const;
423
424 void getBooleanvImpl(GLenum pname, GLboolean *params) const;
425 void getFloatvImpl(GLenum pname, GLfloat *params) const;
426 void getIntegervImpl(GLenum pname, GLint *params) const;
427 void getInteger64vImpl(GLenum pname, GLint64 *params) const;
428 void getIntegerVertexAttribImpl(GLenum pname, GLenum attribpname, GLint *params) const;
429 void getVertexAttribivImpl(GLuint index, GLenum pname, GLint *params) const;
430
431 // Framebuffers are owned by the Context, so these methods do not pass through
432 FramebufferID createFramebuffer();
433 void deleteFramebuffer(FramebufferID framebuffer);
434
435 bool hasActiveTransformFeedback(ShaderProgramID program) const;
436
437 // GL emulation: Interface to entry points
438 ANGLE_GL_1_0_CONTEXT_API
439 ANGLE_GL_1_1_CONTEXT_API
440 ANGLE_GL_1_2_CONTEXT_API
441 ANGLE_GL_1_3_CONTEXT_API
442 ANGLE_GL_1_4_CONTEXT_API
443 ANGLE_GL_1_5_CONTEXT_API
444 ANGLE_GL_2_0_CONTEXT_API
445 ANGLE_GL_2_1_CONTEXT_API
446 ANGLE_GL_3_0_CONTEXT_API
447 ANGLE_GL_3_1_CONTEXT_API
448 ANGLE_GL_3_2_CONTEXT_API
449 ANGLE_GL_3_3_CONTEXT_API
450 ANGLE_GL_4_0_CONTEXT_API
451 ANGLE_GL_4_1_CONTEXT_API
452 ANGLE_GL_4_2_CONTEXT_API
453 ANGLE_GL_4_3_CONTEXT_API
454 ANGLE_GL_4_4_CONTEXT_API
455 ANGLE_GL_4_5_CONTEXT_API
456 ANGLE_GL_4_6_CONTEXT_API
457
458 // GLES emulation: Interface to entry points
459 ANGLE_GLES_1_0_CONTEXT_API
460 ANGLE_GLES_2_0_CONTEXT_API
461 ANGLE_GLES_3_0_CONTEXT_API
462 ANGLE_GLES_3_1_CONTEXT_API
463 ANGLE_GLES_3_2_CONTEXT_API
464 ANGLE_GLES_EXT_CONTEXT_API

466 // Consumes an error.
467 void handleError(GLenum errorCode,
468 const char *message,
469 const char *file,
470 const char *function,
471 unsigned int line);
472
473 void validationError(GLenum errorCode, const char *message) const;
474
475 void markContextLost(GraphicsResetStatus status);
476
477 bool isContextLost() const { return mContextLost; }
478 void setContextLost();
479
480 GLenum getGraphicsResetStrategy() const { return mResetStrategy; }
481 bool isResetNotificationEnabled();
482
483 const egl::Config *getConfig() const;
484 EGLenum getClientType() const;
485 EGLenum getRenderBuffer() const;
486 EGLenum getContextPriority() const;
487
488 const GLubyte *getString(GLenum name) const;
489 const GLubyte *getStringi(GLenum name, GLuint index) const;
490
491 size_t getExtensionStringCount() const;
492
493 bool isExtensionRequestable(const char *name) const;
494 bool isExtensionDisablable(const char *name) const;
495 size_t getRequestableExtensionStringCount() const;
496 void setExtensionEnabled(const char *name, bool enabled);
497 void reinitializeAfterExtensionsChanged();
498
499 rx::ContextImpl *getImplementation() const { return mImplementation.get(); }
500
501 ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool getScratchBuffer(size_t requestedSizeBytes,
502 angle::MemoryBuffer **scratchBufferOut) const;
503 ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool getZeroFilledBuffer(size_t requstedSizeBytes,
504 angle::MemoryBuffer **zeroBufferOut) const;
505 angle::ScratchBuffer *getScratchBuffer() const;
506
507 angle::Result prepareForCopyImage();
508 angle::Result prepareForDispatch();
509
510 MemoryProgramCache *getMemoryProgramCache() const { return mMemoryProgramCache; }
511 std::mutex &getProgramCacheMutex() const;
512
513 bool hasBeenCurrent() const { return mHasBeenCurrent; }
514 egl::Display *getDisplay() const { return mDisplay; }
515 egl::Surface *getCurrentDrawSurface() const { return mCurrentDrawSurface; }
516 egl::Surface *getCurrentReadSurface() const { return mCurrentReadSurface; }
517
518 bool isRobustResourceInitEnabled() const { return mState.isRobustResourceInitEnabled(); }
519
520 bool isCurrentTransformFeedback(const TransformFeedback *tf) const;
521
522 bool isCurrentVertexArray(const VertexArray *va) const
523 {
524 return mState.isCurrentVertexArray(va);
525 }
526
527 bool isShared() const { return mShared; }
528 // Once a context is setShared() it cannot be undone
529 void setShared() { mShared = true; }
530
531 const State &getState() const { return mState; }
532 GLint getClientMajorVersion() const { return mState.getClientMajorVersion(); }
533 GLint getClientMinorVersion() const { return mState.getClientMinorVersion(); }
534 const Version &getClientVersion() const { return mState.getClientVersion(); }
535 const Caps &getCaps() const { return mState.getCaps(); }
536 const TextureCapsMap &getTextureCaps() const { return mState.getTextureCaps(); }
537 const Extensions &getExtensions() const { return mState.getExtensions(); }
538 const Limitations &getLimitations() const { return mState.getLimitations(); }
539 bool isGLES1() const;
540
541 bool skipValidation() const
542 {
543 // Ensure we don't skip validation when context becomes lost, since implementations
544 // generally assume a non-lost context, non-null objects, etc.
545 ASSERT(!isContextLost() || !mSkipValidation);
546 return mSkipValidation;
547 }
548
549 // Specific methods needed for validation.
550 bool getQueryParameterInfo(GLenum pname, GLenum *type, unsigned int *numParams) const;
551 bool getIndexedQueryParameterInfo(GLenum target, GLenum *type, unsigned int *numParams) const;
552
553 ANGLE_INLINE Program *getProgramResolveLink(ShaderProgramID handle) const
554 {
555 Program *program = mState.mShaderProgramManager->getProgram(handle);
556 if (program)
557 {
558 program->resolveLink(this);
559 }
560 return program;
561 }
562
563 Program *getProgramNoResolveLink(ShaderProgramID handle) const;
564 Shader *getShader(ShaderProgramID handle) const;
565
566 ANGLE_INLINE bool isTextureGenerated(TextureID texture) const
567 {
568 return mState.mTextureManager->isHandleGenerated(texture);
569 }
570
571 ANGLE_INLINE bool isBufferGenerated(BufferID buffer) const
572 {
573 return mState.mBufferManager->isHandleGenerated(buffer);
574 }
575
576 bool isRenderbufferGenerated(RenderbufferID renderbuffer) const;
577 bool isFramebufferGenerated(FramebufferID framebuffer) const;
578 bool isProgramPipelineGenerated(ProgramPipelineID pipeline) const;
579 bool isQueryGenerated(QueryID query) const;
580
581 bool usingDisplayTextureShareGroup() const;
582 bool usingDisplaySemaphoreShareGroup() const;
583
584 // Hack for the special WebGL 1 "DEPTH_STENCIL" internal format.
585 GLenum getConvertedRenderbufferFormat(GLenum internalformat) const;
586
587 bool isWebGL() const { return mState.isWebGL(); }
588 bool isWebGL1() const { return mState.isWebGL1(); }
589
590 bool isValidBufferBinding(BufferBinding binding) const { return mValidBufferBindings[binding]; }
591
592 // GLES1 emulation: Renderer level (for validation)
593 int vertexArrayIndex(ClientVertexArrayType type) const;
594 static int TexCoordArrayIndex(unsigned int unit);
595
596 // GL_KHR_parallel_shader_compile
597 std::shared_ptr<angle::WorkerThreadPool> getWorkerThreadPool() const { return mThreadPool; }
598
599 const StateCache &getStateCache() const { return mStateCache; }
600 StateCache &getStateCache() { return mStateCache; }
601
602 void onSubjectStateChange(angle::SubjectIndex index, angle::SubjectMessage message) override;
603
604 void onSamplerUniformChange(size_t textureUnitIndex);
605
606 bool isBufferAccessValidationEnabled() const { return mBufferAccessValidationEnabled; }
607
608 const angle::FrontendFeatures &getFrontendFeatures() const;
609
610 angle::FrameCapture *getFrameCapture() { return mFrameCapture.get(); }
611
612 const VertexArrayMap &getVertexArraysForCapture() const { return mVertexArrayMap; }
613 const QueryMap &getQueriesForCapture() const { return mQueryMap; }
614 const TransformFeedbackMap &getTransformFeedbacksForCapture() const
615 {
616 return mTransformFeedbackMap;
617 }
618
619 void onPreSwap() const;
620
621 Program *getActiveLinkedProgram() const;
622
623 // EGL_ANGLE_power_preference implementation.
624 egl::Error releaseHighPowerGPU();
625 egl::Error reacquireHighPowerGPU();
626 void onGPUSwitch();
627
628 bool noopDraw(PrimitiveMode mode, GLsizei count) const;
629 bool noopDrawInstanced(PrimitiveMode mode, GLsizei count, GLsizei instanceCount) const;
630
631 bool isClearBufferMaskedOut(GLenum buffer, GLint drawbuffer) const;
632 bool noopClearBuffer(GLenum buffer, GLint drawbuffer) const;
633
634 void addRef() const { mRefCount++; }
635 void release() const { mRefCount--; }
636 size_t getRefCount() const { return mRefCount; }
637
638 egl::ShareGroup *getShareGroup() const { return mState.getShareGroup(); }
639
640 private:
641 void initialize();
642
643 angle::Result prepareForDraw(PrimitiveMode mode);
644 angle::Result prepareForClear(GLbitfield mask);
645 angle::Result prepareForClearBuffer(GLenum buffer, GLint drawbuffer);
646 angle::Result syncState(const State::DirtyBits &bitMask,
647 const State::DirtyObjects &objectMask,
648 Command command);
649 angle::Result syncDirtyBits();
650 angle::Result syncDirtyBits(const State::DirtyBits &bitMask);
651 angle::Result syncDirtyObjects(const State::DirtyObjects &objectMask, Command command);
652 angle::Result syncStateForReadPixels();
653 angle::Result syncStateForTexImage();
654 angle::Result syncStateForBlit();
655 angle::Result syncStateForClear();
656 angle::Result syncTextureForCopy(Texture *texture);
657
658 VertexArray *checkVertexArrayAllocation(VertexArrayID vertexArrayHandle);
659 TransformFeedback *checkTransformFeedbackAllocation(TransformFeedbackID transformFeedback);
660
661 angle::Result onProgramLink(Program *programObject);
662
663 void detachBuffer(Buffer *buffer);
664 void detachTexture(TextureID texture);
665 void detachFramebuffer(FramebufferID framebuffer);
666 void detachRenderbuffer(RenderbufferID renderbuffer);
667 void detachVertexArray(VertexArrayID vertexArray);
668 void detachTransformFeedback(TransformFeedbackID transformFeedback);
669 void detachSampler(SamplerID sampler);
670 void detachProgramPipeline(ProgramPipelineID pipeline);
671
672 egl::Error setDefaultFramebuffer(egl::Surface *drawSurface, egl::Surface *readSurface);
673 egl::Error unsetDefaultFramebuffer();

676 void initVersionStrings();

680 void initCaps();
681 void updateCaps();
682
683 gl::LabeledObject *getLabeledObject(GLenum identifier, GLuint name) const;
684 gl::LabeledObject *getLabeledObjectFromPtr(const void *ptr) const;
685
686 void setUniform1iImpl(Program *program,
687 UniformLocation location,
688 GLsizei count,
689 const GLint *v);
690 void renderbufferStorageMultisampleImpl(GLenum target,
691 GLsizei samples,
692 GLenum internalformat,
693 GLsizei width,
694 GLsizei height,
695 MultisamplingMode mode);
696
697 void convertPpoToComputeOrDraw(bool isCompute);
698
699 State mState;
700 bool mShared;
701 bool mSkipValidation;
702 bool mDisplayTextureShareGroup;
703 bool mDisplaySemaphoreShareGroup;
704
705 // Recorded errors
706 ErrorSet mErrors;
707
708 // Stores for each buffer binding type whether is it allowed to be used in this context.
709 angle::PackedEnumBitSet<BufferBinding> mValidBufferBindings;
710
711 std::unique_ptr<rx::ContextImpl> mImplementation;
712
713 EGLLabelKHR mLabel;
714
715 // Extensions supported by the implementation plus extensions that are implemented entirely
716 // within the frontend.
717 Extensions mSupportedExtensions;
718
719 // Shader compiler. Lazily initialized hence the mutable value.
720 mutable BindingPointer<Compiler> mCompiler;
721
722 const egl::Config *mConfig;
723
724 TextureMap mZeroTextures;
725
726 ResourceMap<FenceNV, FenceNVID> mFenceNVMap;
727 HandleAllocator mFenceNVHandleAllocator;
728
729 QueryMap mQueryMap;
730 HandleAllocator mQueryHandleAllocator;
731
732 VertexArrayMap mVertexArrayMap;
733 HandleAllocator mVertexArrayHandleAllocator;
734
735 TransformFeedbackMap mTransformFeedbackMap;
736 HandleAllocator mTransformFeedbackHandleAllocator;
737
738 const char *mVersionString;
739 const char *mShadingLanguageString;
740 const char *mRendererString;
741 const char *mExtensionString;
742 std::vector<const char *> mExtensionStrings;
743 const char *mRequestableExtensionString;
744 std::vector<const char *> mRequestableExtensionStrings;
745
746 // GLES1 renderer state
747 std::unique_ptr<GLES1Renderer> mGLES1Renderer;
748
749 // Current/lost context flags
750 bool mHasBeenCurrent;
751 bool mContextLost; // Set with setContextLost so that we also set mSkipValidation=false.
752 GraphicsResetStatus mResetStatus;
753 bool mContextLostForced;
754 GLenum mResetStrategy;
755 const bool mRobustAccess;
756 const bool mSurfacelessSupported;
757 const bool mExplicitContextAvailable;
758 egl::Surface *mCurrentDrawSurface;
759 egl::Surface *mCurrentReadSurface;
760 egl::Display *mDisplay;
761 const bool mWebGLContext;
762 bool mBufferAccessValidationEnabled;
763 const bool mExtensionsEnabled;
764 MemoryProgramCache *mMemoryProgramCache;
765
766 State::DirtyObjects mDrawDirtyObjects;
767
768 StateCache mStateCache;
769
770 State::DirtyBits mAllDirtyBits;
771 State::DirtyBits mTexImageDirtyBits;
772 State::DirtyObjects mTexImageDirtyObjects;
773 State::DirtyBits mReadPixelsDirtyBits;
774 State::DirtyObjects mReadPixelsDirtyObjects;
775 State::DirtyBits mClearDirtyBits;
776 State::DirtyObjects mClearDirtyObjects;
777 State::DirtyBits mBlitDirtyBits;
778 State::DirtyObjects mBlitDirtyObjects;
779 State::DirtyBits mComputeDirtyBits;
780 State::DirtyObjects mComputeDirtyObjects;
781 State::DirtyBits mCopyImageDirtyBits;
782 State::DirtyObjects mCopyImageDirtyObjects;
783
784 // Binding to container objects that use dependent state updates.
785 angle::ObserverBinding mVertexArrayObserverBinding;
786 angle::ObserverBinding mDrawFramebufferObserverBinding;
787 angle::ObserverBinding mReadFramebufferObserverBinding;
788 std::vector<angle::ObserverBinding> mUniformBufferObserverBindings;
789 std::vector<angle::ObserverBinding> mSamplerObserverBindings;
790 std::vector<angle::ObserverBinding> mImageObserverBindings;
791
792 // Not really a property of context state. The size and contexts change per-api-call.
793 mutable Optional<angle::ScratchBuffer> mScratchBuffer;
794 mutable Optional<angle::ScratchBuffer> mZeroFilledBuffer;
795
796 std::shared_ptr<angle::WorkerThreadPool> mThreadPool;
797
798 // Note: we use a raw pointer here so we can exclude frame capture sources from the build.
799 std::unique_ptr<angle::FrameCapture> mFrameCapture;
800
801 mutable size_t mRefCount;
802
803 OverlayType mOverlay;
804};
805
806// Thread-local current valid context bound to the thread.
807extern thread_local Context *gCurrentValidContext;
